title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Doug Gottlieb fills in for Colin and reacts to the collapse of 76ers in the playoffs and what this says about James Harden's legacy. He looks at the release of the NFL schedule and lays out why Russell Wilson and the Broncos are primed for a hot start to the season. Plus, NBA Champion Jason Terry joins the show to tell Doug what makes Luka Doncic so special. 

 

#douggottliebshow

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
